works.description:
The complete set of photographs of Cyndi 

Lauper performing at Symphony Hall, Birmingham.  These photos were taken  
from my flickr page without permission, still retain the watermark  
identifying me.  The blogger has also gone so far as to provide a byline  
identifying me as the creator of the photographs, but has not requested  
permission, or paid appropriate license fee.  This is a wilful
infringement  
of my copyright as the flickr page where they stole the photos from
clearly  
states the photos are protected by copyright and strictly NO unauthorised 

usage.
